name: Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire - Obsidian Edition
summary:
Set sail on a dangerous voyage to exotic lands in isometric RPG action with Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire - Obsidian Edition. In the sequel to the multi-award-winning RPG, Pillars of Eternity, you'll embark on a quest to find a rogue god over land and sea - with access to additional content including three DLC packs.

As the Watcher and captain of your own upgradable ship, you'll set a course and discover the vast Deadfire Archipelago with a brand-new new character customization system, meaningful companion relationships, freedom of exploration, and a world that reacts to the complex, moral choices you'll have to make.
